pageContent: Aim: To prospectively study the clinical renal effects of daily high-dose celecoxib, a COX-2 inhibitor, in a cohort of elderly sick men (mean age 74.5 years) with advanced prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Anxiety and Depression in Patients with Prostate Cancer, at Cancer Diagnosis and after a One-Year Follow-Up
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/35897487/
